summary: Bug fix verification for Gallery page crash. Fixed additional bug in VideoPlayer.jsx (same issue - video.tags → video.cultural_tags). All requested features tested and working.

minor.issue: Sample videos use external URLs (sample-videos.com) that don't exist, causing 'Failed to fetch' errors in VideoPlayer
minor.note: This is expected for demo data - not a code bug

fixed_bugs.issue: Line 247: video.tags.map() crashed because backend uses cultural_tags field
fixed_bugs.fix: Changed to video.cultural_tags?.map() with optional chaining

passed_tests: Login with superuser credentials (benavidesdenasca@gmail.com / Benavides02@) - SUCCESS
Gallery page loads without crash after login - SUCCESS (original bug fixed)
Gallery displays 6 videos with thumbnails, titles, descriptions - SUCCESS
Category filter 'Líneas de Nasca' shows 4 videos - SUCCESS
Category filter 'Líneas de Palpa' shows 1 video - SUCCESS
Category filter 'Museo Virtual' shows 1 video - SUCCESS
Click on video navigates to /video/{id} - SUCCESS
VideoPlayer page loads without crash (after fix) - SUCCESS
VideoPlayer shows video title, description, category badge - SUCCESS
VideoPlayer shows VR reservation button - SUCCESS
action_items: OPTIONAL: Update sample video data in database to use 'cultural_tags' instead of 'tags' field for consistency
critical_code_review_comments: VideoPlayer.jsx had same bug as Gallery.jsx - both needed video.tags → video.cultural_tags fix
Backend sample data uses 'tags' field but frontend expects 'cultural_tags' - data migration recommended
context_for_next_testing_agent: Gallery and VideoPlayer pages now working. The video.tags → video.cultural_tags fix was applied to both Gallery.jsx (by main agent) and VideoPlayer.jsx (by testing agent). Sample videos in DB still use 'tags' field which is why tags don't display - this is a data issue not code bug.

rca_of_the_issue.root_cause: Backend data model changed from 'tags' to 'cultural_tags' field, but VideoPlayer.jsx was not updated to match Gallery.jsx fix
reproduction_steps: 4. VideoPlayer page crashes with 'Cannot read properties of undefined (reading map)'
rca_of_the_issue.mitigation: Applied optional chaining (?.) to video.cultural_tags in VideoPlayer.jsx line 247
